SCIENTISTS have admitted that they can't rule out the chance that coronavirus could be sexually transmitted.
Researchers from the University of Utah have analysed some early data from men in China who recently had Covid-19.
 Experts say they can't rule out … [+5454 chars]

articles.author: Philip Murray
articles.title: Three new Covid-19 coronavirus cases confirmed in the Highlands, but numbers in hospital fell; mirroring a similar fall across Scotland as a whole - Inverness Courier
articles.description: Three new cases of Covid-19 have been confirmed in the NHS Highland area, taking the overall total to 214.
articles.content:
Coronavirus news.
THREE new cases of Covid-19 have been confirmed in the NHS Highland area, taking the overall total to 214.
It came as Scotland recorded another 371 cases, taking the overall number since the outbreak began to 9409. Sadly the death toll als… [+1227 chars]
